headline: CrowdStrike Valuation Tested As AI Code Security Tools Gain Ground
summary: Anthropic has launched Claude Code Security, an AI powered cybersecurity tool that automates code and application security tasks. The release has sparked fresh questions about how established security software providers such as CrowdStrike Holdings (NasdaqGS:CRWD) will compete as AI driven tools gain traction. Industry participants are actively debating what this means for pricing, customer adoption, and product roadmaps across the broader cybersecurity market. CrowdStrike, known for its...
